org.modelio.api.diagram.tools

Interface IDiagramTool

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAttachedBoxTool, IBoxTool, ILinkTool, IMultiLinkTool
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAttachedBoxTool, DefaultBoxTool, DefaultDiagramTool, DefaultLinkTool, DefaultMultiLinkTool

    public interface IDiagramTool
    Basic definition of a command for the diagram palette.
    It must provide a label, a tooltip and a bitmap.
